name: JCWP Add Quote button in product page
author: JcwpPlugins

sections.description: The “Add Quote” button for WhatsApp in WooCommerce is a feature that allows customers to request quotes directly through the e-commerce platform using WhatsApp. This facilitates communication between the customer and the seller and allows for quick and efficient response to questions and quote requests. Additionally, by being integrated with WooCommerce, the “Add Quote” button seamlessly integrates into your online store and can be customized to fit your needs.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.2 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended
  1. Upload quote-button-by-whatsapp folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the settings in: Settings/Quote Button by WhatsApp
sections.faq:
How do I begin working with this plugin?

Activate the plugin, add the settings and you’re done
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • New configuration option is added to show button only on products that belong to a specific category

1.0.1

  • Add Settings link on plugins page

1.0.0

  • Initial Plugin release

short_description: A plugin that adds a WhatsApp quote button on the WooCommerce product and shop page.
description: The “Add Quote” button for WhatsApp in WooCommerce is a feature that allows customers to request quotes directly through the e-commerce platform using WhatsApp. This facilitates communication between the customer and the seller and allows for quick and efficient response to questions and quote requests. Additionally, by being integrated with WooCommerce, the “Add Quote” button seamlessly integrates into your online store and can be customized to fit your needs.

screenshots.caption: Show button only on products that belong to a specific category
